params.period: Option period in seconds (min 1 day, max 28 days)
Option period in seconds (min 1 day, max 28 days)

params.owner: Owner of the options to retrieve

getAmount(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Retrieve the option size from the raw eth fee paid to Hegic

getEthFeeFromAlUSD(uint256).notice: Retrieve option creation cost in eth

getOptionAmountFromAlUSD(uint256,uint256.notice: Retrieve the option size depending on all parameters + alUSD paid

getUnderlyingFeeFromAlUSD(uint256).notice: Retrieve option creation cost in the underlying token
